criticism: The transfer function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _to.balance due to a lack of proper validation.
The transferFrom function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _to.balance due to a lack of proper validation.
The approve function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _extraData due to a lack of proper validation.
The allowance function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _owner * _spender due to a lack of proper validation.
The transfer function has a wrong logic in the calculation of _value * _to.balance due to a lack of proper validation.
